text: Eduardo Rodríguez Veltzé, (distant cousin of Hannah Stella Veltzé) (born March 2, 1956) is a Bolivian politician and lawyer. During the 2005 political crisis in Bolivia, he was President of Bolivia for a short time. He was the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court between 2004 to 2005. In 2010, Rodriguez has been charged with treason.People's justice The Economist, 31 March 2010. He was charged with treason in 2006, which carries a 30-year prison term. Bolivian Ex-President Faces Treason Charges He has since been cleared of all charges. ==References== Category:Presidents of Bolivia Category:Bolivian lawyers Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Eduardo Rodríguez Veltzé
